channel.title: maraschino-liqueur on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in maraschino-liqueur on Recipes

item.title: Aviation
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml Gin 20 ml Lemon juice 10 ml Maraschino liqueur 5 ml Sugar syrup 5ml crème de violette cherry Instructions Shake ingredients (crème de violette optional). Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Brandy 15 ml Triple sec 15 ml Lemon juice 10 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes Aromatic bitters sugar lemon twist Instructions Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients (Maraschino optional). Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Brooklyn
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml Rye whisky 20 ml Dry vermouth 7.5 ml Amaro 5 ml Maraschino liqueur orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve up. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Hemingway special
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml Rum 30 ml Grapefruit juice 15 ml Lime juice 15 ml Maraschino liqueur 5 ml Sugar syrup lime slice Instructions Shake with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass Garnish with lime slice.

item.title: Martinez
item.description: Ingredients 45 ml Gin 45 ml Sweet vermouth 5 ml Maraschino liqueur 4 dashes Aromatic bitters lemon twist Instructions Stirred over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
